djangotailoring.tracking.decorators¶

Decorators¶

djangotailoring.tracking.decorators.log_page_view(f)¶
Parameters:f (a Django view callable) – the wrapped view callable
Return type:a Django view callable

Acts as a wrapper for any callable Django view that returns an django.core.http.HttpResponse. When the view returns a response, its status_code attribute is checked. If the status_code is 200, a djangotailoring.tracking.eventnames.EventNames.PageViewed event is created. Otherwise, if the response is a redirect, a djangotailoring.tracking.eventnames.EventNames.Redirected event is created with the request path and destination path attached in the note. In any other case, a djangotailoring.tracking.eventnames.EventNames.PageError event is created with the path and response code attached to the note.
